this_title: Her Story No. 2: Hush Little Baby
trans_title: 她的故事2：安静的小宝贝
introduction: In this unfolding of a strained father-daughter relationship, Lacey, a young mother, visits her father Richard in a maximum-security penitentiary where he's serving a sentence for luring and attempting to have sex with a child. Lacey maintains a strong front until she finds herself with questions about Richard's past, ones that he can't get away from with answers she doesn't know how to handle. Then Lacey sees something that shakes her to the core, forcing her to make a decision that will change their lives forever.
chinese_title: 她的故事2：安静的小宝贝
foreign_title: Her Story No. 2: Hush Little Baby
